channel.title: Project- insanity - long list of things i cannot fix (help)
channel.description:
since theres going to be alot of things i need help with im going to make it fancy my problems keep growing and growing and the funniet thing is...im still only working on ym donar zone people helping me : neil _____
_____
things i need fixis from scratch since going into detail would take me about 6 hours to right this post
1) my stall wont give items when clicked on when its in my donar zone 2)i have added a shop but it will not sell items to me 3)i need to know how to add drops to monsters (we cannot figure out how) 4) we need to know how to change probabilites like sigils only drop say extremely rare 5)(more client help) but my addmodel wont work .... these are our current problems... if you could help us fix them would be greatly appreaciated pm me or maybe link tutorials for each of my problem or add me on msn "michaelthirlwell@hotmail.com"
